trialtypes.create_feedback:
<script>
Trial.set("growth_feedback",[{
  "correct":   "Correct: Apply that effort to the next one too",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: You need to apply more effort to the next one"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: Your work paid off",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: If you work harder it'll pay off"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: You must have tried hard on that one",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: You must try harder next time"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: I can see you have put in effort to get that right",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: You didn't put in enough effort"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: If you keep this up you'll be able to do even harder ones",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: Keep trying and you'll get there" 
},{
  "correct": "Correct: The more you do the better you'll get",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: But you'll get better the more you do"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: Hard work is needed to do well on this",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: Hard work is needed to do well on this"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: You clearly worked hard",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: You needed to work harder"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: Practice makes perfect",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: But practice makes perfect"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: Keep up the good work",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: With a bit more work you'll get the next one"
}]);

Trial.set("fixed_feedback",[{
  "correct": "Correct: You must be really smart",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: That was probably too difficult"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: You're really good at this",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: Hopefully the next one will be easier"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: You're a natural at this",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: This seems beyond your ability"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: You must be good at maths",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: It is hard for some people to grasp this"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: This must be your strength",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: Maths might not be one of your strengths"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: Well done, you made that look easy",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: That wasn't an easy one"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: You are clearly very gifted at this",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: You might be gifted at something else"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: Intelligent people find these easy",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: Intelligent people find these easy"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: You're an arithmetic genius",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: Arithmetic isn't for everyone"
},{
  "correct": "Correct: Some people are talented at this",
  "incorrect": "Incorrect: Some people are talented at this"
}]);
Trial.submit();
</script>
